person.headline: VP - Lead Software Engineer || ☞ ☁ AI ML || AWS || Azure || Solution Architecture & Design || Automation || Cloud Migration || Blend of Technology & Leadership
person.summary:
Innovative technology professional who takes pride in building complex solutions with basic technology, getting the most from a company’s technology investment. Recognised as a problem solver focused on making technology work. Accomplished researcher who turns challenges into building blocks to learn new technology, master advanced stills and streamline processes. Applies natural talent to translate a love of learning into love of teaching, and helping others to learn.

✔ Innovative & tech-savvy software development professional with progressive experience specializing in object-oriented approach to enterprise commercial solution delivery utilizing latest technologies.
✔ Extensive background in Full Life-Cycle of Software Development and Automation process including requirements gathering, design, coding, unit testing, automation, debugging and maintenance.
✔ Comprehensive knowledge of Relational Database technology, queries and procedures.
✔ Excellent understanding of OOPS Concepts, Design Patterns & Best Coding Practices.
✔ Strong architectural knowledge of designing n-tier and n-layer solutions using Application blocks, Enterprise library, SOA, Software factories.
✔ Working experience of IIS administration and website deployment and configuration.

♛ Strengths & Area of expertise include:

✔ Full Stack Enterprise Web Development
✔ Multi-Threaded Programming
✔ Object Oriented Development
✔ REST APIs Development & Integration
✔ Distributed/Client Server System
✔ TDD & Behavior Driven Development (BDD)
✔ Database Design & Development
✔ Exceptional Analytical & Quick Learning Skill
✔ Team & Client Communication
✔ Proactive & Organization Development Attitude

positionHistory.description: Skills: Systems Design · Amazon Web Services (AWS) · Solution Architecture · Team Leadership · Cloud-Native Architecture · Process Automation · Automation · Scikit-Learn · Kubernetes · Web Application Security · GitHub · Machine Learning · Event Driven Programming · REST APIs · Technical Project Leadership · Python (Programming Language)

positionHistory.title: Associate
positionHistory.description: Skills: Web Application Security · GitHub · REST APIs · React.js

positionHistory.title: Senior Software Engineer
positionHistory.description:
 Utilize the .NET framework, NodeJS, and JavaScript frameworks to develop multi-tiered and fast web applications consisting of reusable widgets/components and REST APIs following SAFe principles.
 Responsible for full stack development from writing Web APIs to creating client widgets and configuration.
 Mentor the team continuously, provide them training and guide them for delivering quality products.
 Document and diagram the design of solution interfaces, implementations, and dependencies.
 Provide detailed task definitions and time estimates for project deliverable.
 Create unit tests and automations to ensure functional integrity of solutions.
 Troubleshoot application issues down to the network protocol level.
 Collaborate with development team members to create a consistent approach across feature implementations.
 Participate in code reviews and play an active role in ensuring best practices are enforced in all team development work.

positionHistory.title: Software Developer
positionHistory.description:
- Responsible for end to end delivery of scalable and high-performance components.
- Analyze, review requirements from product specifications and provide accurate estimates.
- Design, initiate and handle technical designs and complex application features.
- Individually own module development and review all engineering deliverables.
- Perform unit testing using NUnit and dependency injection through Ninject.
- Participate in peer code review and provide quality suggestions.
- Working on client requests and providing solutions communicating with clients.
- Integrate web services and third party API with application.
- Conducting technical training sessions for peers and guiding them throughout development.

company.name: JPMorganChase
company.description:
With a history tracing its roots to 1799 in New York City, JPMorganChase is one of the world's oldest, largest, and best-known financial institutions—carrying forth the innovative spirit of our heritage firms in global operations across 100 markets.
 
We serve millions of customers and many of the world’s most prominent corporate, institutional, and government clients daily, managing assets and investments, offering business advice and strategies, and providing innovative banking solutions and services.
